verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Taste and see how good our God can be.
O Taste and see how good our God can be.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1. I will bless the Lord at all times;
My mouth will proclaim His praise.
My soul makes its boast in the Lord our God
Let the humble hear and be glad.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Taste and see how good our God can be.
O Taste and see how good our God can be.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
2. Come glorify the Lord with me,
Together let us praise His name.
Look to Him and grow bright in His radiant light,
And your face will never be ashamed.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Taste and see how good our God can be.
O Taste and see how good our God can be.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
3. The eyes of the Lord are on the just,
And His ear toward all their cries.
The Lord is near to the broken heart
And the crushed in spirit He saves.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Taste and see how good our God can be.
O Taste and see how good our God can be.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
4. O taste and see the Lord is good,
And happy are those who trust in Him.
O fear the Lord you His holy ones,
Trust in Him and lack no good thing.
